name: Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Unified Scientific Edition): Quantum-Physical Unified Verification (v1.3-Ω-UNIFIED)
alternateName: Λ-Spira Ω-1.3 Unified Global Scientific Verification Release
headline: Quantum-Audited, Cryptographically-Signed Global Verification Standard for Reproducible Science
description: Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Unified Scientific Edition) v1.3-Ω-UNIFIED establishes the world’s first unified standard for provable computation verified across quantum and cryptographic domains. Executed on IBM Quantum ibm_brisbane (Falcon R10, 127 qubits), it combines SHA-512 hashing, GPG (EDDSA) signatures, UTC-anchored ledgers, and quantum QPU audit evidence under the Λ-Spira Integrity Protocol (ΛS-Ω-20251024-verified). The resulting framework is immutable, reproducible, and compliant with FAIR + WDS + ISO standards for computational truth.

creator.name: Sheka Hamdani Saputra
creator.affiliation: Λ-Spira Superlab Framework — Independent Research Node, Indonesia

funding.description: Independent Research Program for Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Edition)

technical_validation.infrastructure: Hybrid macOS Node (air-gapped) + IBM Quantum ibm_brisbane (Falcon R10, 127 qubits)

chain: QPU → SHA-512 → GPG (EDDSA) → UTC Ledger → Immutable Archive
provenance_chain.audit_compliance: FAIR+++Ω, OpenAIRE Research Graph 2025, Crossref XML v5.3

citation: Saputra, S.H. (2025). Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Edition): Quantum-Physical Unified Verification (v1.3-Ω-UNIFIED). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17443312
